resources.string: Take a picture to save your face
Enroll your voice by saying three times:
Take a picture to sign in
\"Be yourself, anyone else is already taken.\"
Record one of the listed sentences to sign in.

"- I'm going to make him an offer he cannot refuse"

"- Be yourself, anyone else is already taken"

"- Houston we have had a problem"

"- My voice is my passport, verify me"

"- Apple juice tastes funny after toothpaste"

"- You can get in without password"

"- You can activate security system now"

"- My voice is stronger than passwords"

"- My password is not your business"

"- My name is unknown to you"
